About us

Lucky Brand was founded in 1990 with a spirit of reinvention. Rooted in premium denim, Americana and self expression, our brand is for the free– thinkers and the optimists who don’t take life too seriously. For those who say, “take-me-as-I-am. Or don’t. It’s cool.” In the beginning we experimented with vintage jeans, remixing the classic to create something new. Now we make denim AND lifestyle wares. Call it eclectic Americana for all. Our products portray personality through perfectly imperfect, often American-heritage inspired details that bring levity to any look, or situation. Lucky Brand brings The Luckening – that sweet thing that happens during a blah day that reminds you there’s always a lighter view. We know great fitting jeans won’t change your life, but maybe they can make you feel a little luckier.

Read more

GZWHD

TO BE WITH YOU

GZWHD is committed to creating elegant and delicate jewelry for women. It keeps up with fashion trends and transforms various trend elements into beautiful and practical jewelry to meet the diverse needs of modern women. Fashion design and high quality make GZWHD a popular brand.

bracelet Length ：18+3cm/7″+1″

A SPECIAL GIFT FOR A ROMANTIC MOMENT

This teardrop jewelry set is unique and elegant, it is an ideal gift for wife/lover/girlfriend/mother/daughter/friend/sister/bride/bridesmaid and yourself on Anniversaries/Valentine’s Day/Mother’s Day/Birthday/Wedding/Christmas/Thanksgiving Day.

Open/Adjustable Ring

The open ring size can be freely adjusted from size 6 to size 11, you can adjust it until it fits your finger perfectly.

Extended Bracelet

The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).You can make it fit your wrist by attaching and detaching the extension section freely.

Necklace Introduction

The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”, This means you can choose any length between 17.7″-19.7″(45cm-50cm).This necklace is attached with a lobster clasp. It is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely.

Sealed Gift Box

We pack and ship each jewelry set in a sealed jewelry box. It is perfect as a gift to send directly to wife/lover/girlfriend/friend/sister/mom/bride/bridesmaid on anniversary/valentine’s day/birthday/mother’s day/Christmas day

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 4, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09PNBZTKP

The main stone is a 12mm*16mm (pendant) and 10mm*14mm (earrings and ring) waterdrop created-ruby, and the side stones are multiple inlaid round cubic zirconia. The bracelet contains 16 oval created-ruby and 32 round white cubic zirconia.
ABOUT SIZE: The size of the open ring can be adjusted from size6 to size11. The length of the necklace is 17.7”+2”(45cm+5cm). The necklace connected by lobster clasp,and it is separated from the pendant, and the pendant can be replaced freely. The length of the bracelet is 7 ”(main part) + 1” (extension section, detachable).
ITEMS YOU WILL GET: A ring, a pair of earrings, a pendant and necklace set, a bracelet, and a gift box.
QUALITY ASSURANCE: These jewelry are brand new, and they will be double-checked before sending, we will check every part of the whole set of jewelry to ensure that they are working properly and without any defects. We provide a 60-day unconditional refund service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

Product Specification

Metal:Alloy
Material:Acrylic and Rattan
Color:Gold

Package Contains:

16 Pairs Rattan Earrings and Tassel Earrings
1 Packing BOX

Wonderful Gift

Give This Earring As A Unique Present to Your Loved Ones, Like Lover, Girlfriend, Wife, Fiancee, Mother, Mother in Law, Daughter, Friend or Yourself for Valentine’s day, Mother’s day, Christmas Day And So On. Express Your Love to Them and Make Them Feel Special and Happy.

COMPLETELY VERSATILE

This earring fit all your dress, like jeans, dress, coat ect. You Can Wear It for Birthday Party, Wedding, Anniversary, Festival Celebration, Concert. Just Get It and Show Your Own Style In the Crowd.

Maintenance Tips:

Avoid Chemicals. Please take it away from cleaning agents,perfumes, body moisturizer, ect. It can take off the finish and change color
Avoid Contact with Water, No Baths, Pools, Sea Water, etc. If it gets wet that can leave dark water spots which are difficult to remove
Please Don’t Wear It When Sleeping. To keep your gorgeous jewelry looking like new, take it off at the end of the day and give it a quick wipe down with a microfiber cloth
Avoid Violent Collision. It is easy to deform your jewelry
Take it off when you sweating a lot, avoid prolonged wear. It can cause erosion
Please store them in zippered plastic bags, squeeze air out to limit the oxygen that gets to jewelry

Please note:

Since this earring back is small, please keep it away from children and pets, beware swallowed
Please clean it with soft cloth before your wear it every time, if you feel uncomfortable, just stop to wear it.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

We Promise 90-Days Exchange and Money Back Guarantee.If You Have Any Problems on Our Earring,Contact us We Will Reply You within 24 Hours

Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ LANTAI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BFFGFPMV

About Us

The New York designer, has built her long-standing career in fashion by following her own set of rules. Known for her celebration of the exuberant, the embellished, and the over the top, Betsey Johnson continues rocking the fashion industry with her unique and original designs.Her commitment to remain true to her one-of-a-kind vision has afforded Betsey much success in an industry known for its fickleness.Her ability to change with the times while keeping her designs pure has not gone unnoticed.Products are also stocked in better department stores including Bloomingdales, Nordstrom,and Macy’s.

Since 2004,Betsey Johnson LLC has expanded its product offerings through more than a dozen licensing agreements”Like red lipstick on the mouth, my products wake up and brighten and bring the wearer to life…drawing attention to her beauty and specialness…her moods and movements her…dreams and fantasies” – Betsey Johnson ONWARD, BETSEY!

Betsey Johnson continues to be the brand’s Creative Director, designing the Betsey Johnson line. The brand will now focus on expanding Betsey Johnson’s business worldwide.

Read more

Our Story

Our history begins in 1990, when we started crafting vintage-inspired jeans here in Los Angeles. Staying true to the rich heritage and all-American spirit of denim, we ripped, sanded, patched, and washed our jeans by hand to give them true character and soul. Then we added authentic hardware, personalized touches, and playful details, and a true blue American icon was born. As the original premium denim brand, Lucky Brand has always created the quality jeans , never sacrificing the classic fits, unique washes, and vintage details that set us apart . We continue to develop innovative fabrics and source from the finest factories and mills to create truly unique pieces you’ll keep coming back to.

Our jeans are made for the free thinkers, the thrill seekers, the go-getters, the daydreamers, those who have their own look and make their own luck. We find inspiration everywhere, from the laid-back lifestyle of our Southern California roots to contemporary pop culture and music.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 22, 2021
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09B34JNLG

Napier Signature Jewelry: We create classic jewelry for the modern American woman; Tailored with an eye for trend right color, we offer traditional metal styling in polished or textured finishes
Jewelry for Modern Women: Versatility is at the core of our philosophy; Find your inspiration with our line of high fashion earrings, from gold to silver to pearl, from classic hoops to crystal studs
Head to Toe Sophistication: Our earrings, necklaces and bracelets are designed to complement head to toe dressing with sophisticated silhouettes that can allow you to go from desk to dinner in style
Look and Feel of Luxury: The Napier brand appeals to the modern woman with collections that are clean and polished, carrying on our heritage with designs that convey the look and feel of luxury

Read more

Elegant. Chic. Timeless.

Napier is a great American brand, in fact, Napier was the first U.S. brand to manufacture fashion jewelry in the U.S. – specifically in Attleboro MA.

Vintage Napier pieces are still highly valued and collectible – whether oversized links, colorful enamels or large button earrings. Many celebrities regularly wore Napier, including first ladies and even Marilyn Monroe!

Today, Napier continues to be a leading U.S. fashion jewelry brand offering the modern woman an amazing selection of timeless designs along with trend right seasonal pieces at a moderate cost.

Read more
